intro.1: Welcome to Qadaa! Your companion to make up and count the prayers you have missed. May Allah accept from us all!

counter.1: This is your counter, you can add or subtract prayers you make up here
counter.2: Let's try and add a prayer here
counter.3: You can also add many prayers, Let's try
counter.4: Enter the number of prayers you made up
counter.7: You can add the five prayers for one day, Let's try
counter.8: This will add 1 to every prayer's counter
counter.9: You can also add the five prayers for many days, Please press and hold the button
counter.10: This will add to every prayer's counter

calendar.1: You can see your logs here
calendar.2: This  is the number of prayers you made up that day, Click to see details
calendar.3: You can view and edit the day prayers here
calendar.4: You can check your hader prayers here

settings.1: Let's setup your profile to calculate the number of prayers you missed
settings.2: Start date is the start of the period you want to make up for. Select it now
settings.3: End date is the end of the period you want to make up for. Select it now
settings.5: Your period days aren't added in the total days you need to make up for
settings.6: Set a daily target to make up prayers every day
settings.7: Let's save your settings and start making up prayers
settings.8: This is your profile, you can see your daily progress, overall progress and your settings here
